title: Lamb rump navarin with rosemary dumplings and roasted onions and parsnips
description: Navarin is a wonderfully warming French lamb stew. Try it with rosemary dumplings and delicious roasted veg for a hearty meal.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 sprigs fresh rosemary, leaves only, roughly chopped
125g/4½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
2 red onions, peeled, cut into wedges
salt and freshly ground black pepper
